name: Wondering Scammer
description:
Very simple game about a scammer (you) trying to get free money from trading.

Credits:

-EDER - BEAUTIFUL background perfect for parallax effect. (Unity asset store) -  https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/nature/free-pixel-ar...

-CAINOS - MAGNIFICENT and HUGE asset pack perfect for making villages. (Unity asset store) - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/pixel-art-platformer-villa...

-Lagua Vesa - background music.
